SageTVPlugin.Name: nielm_sageimdb
SageTVPlugin.Description: SageTV Dependency JAR Plugin for nielm_sageimdb.jar - there is normally no need to download directly
SageTVPlugin.Author: nielm, JREkiwi
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
2.0.4 Fix for changes on IMDB website 2.0.3 Fix for IMDB "New Interface"
2.0.2.1 Change download to https
2.0.2 Reinstate Season and Epsiode numbers on Program Reinstate Birth Info on Person Fix multiple nicknames Add Death Info on Person Add getPob() getDod() getPod() Change Java reference to 1.6
2.0.1 Cast update. thanks again spencerw
2.0.0 Fix to work with reformatted IMDB. thanks spencerw
1.8.8 Third pass at fixing Person lookup after IMDB format change Fix Person filmographies for missing single type entries and exceptions
1.8.7 Second pass at fixing Person lookup after IMDB format change Filmographies for TV still require work Fix Locations and Plot summaries
1.8.6 First pass at fixing Person lookup after IMDB format change Filmographies do not work yet
1.8.5 Fix Quotes, Trivia and Goofs after another format change at IMDB 1.8.4 Interim fix for "new and improved" search on IMDB site that returns less information 1.8.3 Workaround for changes to Episodes on IMDB site Add getGoofs() 1.8.2 Fixed Quote formatting 1.8.1 Fixed Actor Roles 1.8 Fixed reading of Person data Fixed reading of Title Trivia
